alert.note: Alert for Sanpete Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 10:13PM MST until December 31 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Sanpete Valley. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions, including snow packed roads and reduced visibilities, can be expected through Friday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
